@title IoTDeviceAuth
 @dev Manages authentication and registration of IoT devices.

@dev Registers a new IoT device.
 @param deviceId The unique identifier of the device.

@dev Unregisters an IoT device.
 @param deviceId The unique identifier of the device.

devdoc.details: Manages authentication and registration of IoT devices.

params.deviceId: The unique identifier of the device.

returns._0: bool True if the device is registered, false otherwise.
